author: kpvdr
msg: QPID-5671: [linearstore] Add ability to use disk partitions and select per-queue EFPs. This is the first part of resolving this issue and changes the journal directory structure to use symlinks instead of moving the actual files. This opens the way to having files from multiple partitions in the same journal. Other small improvements and tidy-ups also included.

author: rec
msg: [UIMA-3024] CASDumpWriter is sensitive to type system changes
- As a last resort try sorting by CAS address.

author: julianfoad
msg: On the 'move-tracking-2' branch: Tweak error message formatting.
sub_main): Start error messages with a capital letter and don't end
